page.title: 18Sigglesthorne:National
page.content: Sigglesthorne has not featured in any national events of significance. There is an entry in the{Domesday Book for Sigglesthorne, which translated into modern English is: In Sigglesthorne eight carucates of land to be taxed. There is one plough in the demesne and fourteen villeins and five bordars having six ploughs. There is a priest and a church and sixteen acres of meadow. Sigglesthorne was included in the list of the berewicks of St.Johns Church{Beverley. Sigglesthorne has paid its Tithes and{taxes,}sent its men to{war, {billeted}servicemen and{evacuees,}but has largely let the world pass by changing slowly in response to the economic factors of the time.
